Module software1.finalsoftwarev2

Class MainScreenController

java.lang.Object
software1.finalsoftwarev2.MainScreenController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class MainScreenController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
MainScreen Controller. This is the Controller for the main screen that house everything needed for the main screen to function properly

    • onActionAddPart

      void onActionAddPart(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      AddPart button method. Open to the addpart fxml screen.
      Parameters:
      event - this event is tied to the button of the original source to help load the stage

      IOException

    • onActionDeletePart

      void onActionDeletePart(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Delete part action. Gets the selected part, asks for user input if want to delete, and removes the part from the table.
      Parameters:
      event - ActionEvent

    • onActionDeleteProduct

      void onActionDeleteProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Deletes product action. Gets selected product, asks for user input if want to delete, and removes product form teh table. Won't allow deletion if product has associated parts!
      Parameters:
      event - ActionEvent

    • onActionExit

      void onActionExit(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Exit button. Upon hitting the exit button, program terminates with no error codes.
      Parameters:
      event - ActionEvent

    • onActionModifyPart

      void onActionModifyPart(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Modify Button. Once clicked, the program opens the modify part fxml, and based on the selected part, with populate correct data.
      Parameters:
      event - ActionEvent
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onActionModifyProduct

      void onActionModifyProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Modify Product Button. Once clicked, the program opens the modify product fxml, and based on the selected product, with populate correct data.
      Parameters:
      event - ActionEvent
      Throws:
      IOException
